author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Get a 3-Day Free Trial of Nebula to watch Lindsay Ellis, exclusives from me, and much more at https://go.nebula.tv/tomnicholas

Watch my debut film Boomers exclusively on Nebula here: https://nebula.tv/boomers?ref=tomnicholas

A video about why conservatives from J.D. Vance to Joe Rogan are turning to God. Again.

Written, directed, and presented by Tom Nicholas.
Filmed and edited by Georgia Burrows.
Production assistance by Jack Carter.

00:00 Intro: Jesus Saves Soho
05:12 Part One: J.D. Vance Comes to God (and the Cotswolds)
13:26 Part Two: Christian Nationalism
19:54 Part Three: The Not-Very-Quiet Revival
28:14 Part Four: Christianism
39:31 Part Five: False Idols

Watch this video ad- and sponsor-free on Nebula at https://nebula.tv/videos/tomnicholas-the-second-coming-of-the-religious-right

title: Why Conservatives are Obsessed with God (Again)
